      • refreshCurrentUser

        public void refreshCurrentUser(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used when a seller wants to delete or show one of his products. It loads the user from the database and updates currentUser.
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user)

                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    User FactUser)
                             throws WrongPasswordException
        This method is used when the user log in the system. It checks if the informations in the database and the informations provided by the user are similar.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String nick,
                    java.lang.String pass,
                    java.lang.String email)
             throws ObjectAlreadyExistsException,
                    ObjectCreatedException,
                    EmptyFieldsException
        This method is used when an admin wants to add a user(via the AddUserView).
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user), pass, email If the product is already in the database, then this method returns an ObjectAlreadyExistsException, else an ObjectCreatedException is returned and the user is added to the database.
        Throws:
        ObjectCreatedException, - ObjectAlreadyExistsException, EmptyFieldsException
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        ObjectAlreadyExistsException
        ObjectCreatedException
        EmptyFieldsException

      • modifyUser

        public void modifyUser(java.lang.String nick,
                       java.lang.String pass,
                       java.lang.String email,

                       java.lang.String lastname,
                       java.lang.String city,
                       java.lang.String street,
                       java.lang.String postalcode,
                       java.lang.String streetnumber)
                throws ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException,
                       ObjectModifiedException
        This method is used when an admin modifies the informations of a user (via ModifyUserView).
        Parameters:
        nick - (a String giving the nickname of the user), pass, email, firstname, lastname, city, street, postalcode, streetnumber
        Throws:
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        ObjectModifiedException

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(java.lang.String nick)
                throws ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException,
                       ObjectDeletedException
        This method is used when an admin wants to delete one user (via DeleteUserView). It checks if the user is registered in the database (thanks to its nickname).
        Parameters:
        nick - (a String giving the nickname of the user) If the user does not exist in the database, then this method returns an ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException, else an ObjectDeletedException is returned and the used is deleted from the database.
        Throws:
        ObjectDeletedException
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
